CHAT.comment: HEMI GROUP, LLC AND KAI GACHUPIN, Petitioners v. CITY OF NEW YORK, NEW YORK.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 1:00 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF RANDOLPH H. BARNHOUSE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LEONARD J. KOERNER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF RANDOLPH H. BARNHOUSE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 2:01 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
